metadata.description: A collection of plugins to enhance Claude's capabilities.

plugins.name: architecture-design
plugins.description: Create comprehensive software architecture documentation through guided interviews.

plugins.name: devops
plugins.description: devops skills such as generate Helm chart, Terraform script, CI/CD pipeline, GitOps, Docker.

plugins.name: browser-devtools
plugins.description: Provides debugging web applications, monitoring network traffic, capturing screenshots, DOM inspection, performance analysis, and testing UI interactions during development.
